item.title: About
item.description: Y2K zoomer interested in offensive security. No professional experience … yet. “The quieter you become, the more you can hear.” Links https://based.cooking/ - simple recipe website without the web bloat https://slipfox.xyz - free uploads, link shortening, and way more https://teachyourselfcs.com/ - roadmap for self-taught CS education https://book.hacktricks.xyz/ - wiki with some useful info https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/index.html - OWASP Cheat Sheets https://evoxt.com/ - cheap VPS, good customer support https://new.reddit.com/r/hacking/wiki/index/ - good resources listed here

item.title: OverTheWire: Leviathan
item.description: OverTheWire’s Leviathan wargame is all about reverse engineering of x86 binaries. The description of the game states that it only requires knowledge of linux command line utilities, and little to no programming experience. Each level goes as such: You ssh into the server as the user whose password you obtained from the previous level. Through whatever means necessary, you get the password to the next level. There are no hints given for any of the levels, so it is completely up to us to figure out what we are looking for.
